feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [GRA9][Virtual Private Servers] - Upgrade infrastructure
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 07:00 - 07:30 UTC

Feb 16, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/03/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2022 07:30 UTC
Service impact : The impacted servers cannot be manipulated (reboot, reinstallation...) during this operation.
Servers continue to operate normally during maintenance and new orders can be delivered.
Service improvement : Upgrade of the Virtual Private Servers infrastructure (RabbitMQ servers)

entry.title: VPS - GRA2 - host651167
entry.content:
Mar 2, 14:49 UTC
Identified - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour hour(s)

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated servers] - 24A17
entry.content:
Mar 2, 14:03 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/03/2022 11:15 UTC
End Time : 02/03/2022 13:50 UTC
Service impact : 5 servers are UP again
Root cause : The repair of the leak and the restart of the servers is underway. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Mar 2, 13:36 UTC
Update - There are 4 servers down, our teams are still working on this incident.

Mar 2, 11:55 UTC
Identified - Start time : 02/03/2022 11:15 UTC
Service impact : 5 servers down
Root cause : The incident is due to a leak in the waterblock
Ongoing actions : The repair of the leak and the restart of the servers is underway. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - Servers unavailable if rebooted
entry.content:
Mar 2, 13:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/03/2022 22:30 UTC
End Time : 02/03/2022 13:37 UTC
Service impact : Servers of all the datacenters are now operational

Mar 2, 12:35 UTC
Update - Update :Servers in the Warsaw datacenters are no longer impacted by the incident. Servers of the Limburg and Beauharnois datacenter are still being treated. A last server is being processed in the Graveline datacenter

Mar 2, 12:23 UTC
Update - Update :All servers in the Singapore, Sydney, Erith and Strasbourg datacenters are no longer impacted by the incident. A last server is being processed in the Roubaix datacenter

Mar 2, 10:33 UTC
Update - Update :Datacenter technicians are currently working to bring the impacted servers back online

Mar 2, 10:28 UTC
Update - Update :The new patch is functional. We will start the deployment

Mar 2, 10:13 UTC
Update - Update :A new patch is being tested.

Mar 2, 09:50 UTC
Update - Update :The first tests are not conclusive. Our teams continue to work to improve the situation

Mar 2, 09:35 UTC
Update - Update :We are testing a workaround to correct the situation. If the tests are conclusive we deploy it on the whole infrastructure

Mar 2, 08:59 UTC
Identified - Update : Our technical teams found a workaround for the situation.
They are currently writing a patch and will test it. We will keep you informed when it is deployed.

Mar 2, 08:46 UTC
Update - Update :Our technical teams are still investigating to find a workaround and repair the situation. We will get back to you as soon as we have more information

Mar 2, 01:36 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Other datacenters SYD/ SGP/ WAW are being affected by this issue, our technical teams still investigating the root cause.

Mar 2, 00:28 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 2, 00:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/03/2022 22:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers may be unavailable if rebooted.
Ongoing actions : We are currently investigating the source of the issue.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Licensing] - Plesk/Windows licenses
entry.content:
Mar 2, 13:15 UTC
Update - The patch has been successfully deployed, all tasks have been restarted. Suspensions and creations have been fixed.
There is still some latency on deletions though.

Mar 2, 10:51 UTC
Identified - Start time : 02/03/2022 08:40 UTC
Service impact : The creation of new licenses, as well as the suspension and deletion of Plesk and windows licenses are impacted.
Root cause : incident caused by licensing micro service migrated to kubernetes
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently deploying a fix. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

entry.title: [BHS4][Dedicated Servers] - T04D09
entry.content:
Mar 2, 10:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/03/2022 08:14 UTC
End Time : 02/03/2022 09:35 UTC
Root cause : Due to a leak, we have cut the T04D09 rack to avoid overheating.

Mar 2, 08:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/03/2022 08:14 UTC
Service impact : We have to shut down the servers in the T04D09 rack due to an incident on the cooling system.
Ongoing actions : We will get back to you as soon as we have more information

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated servers] - G135A09
entry.content:
Mar 2, 07:22 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 02/03/2022 04:00 UT
End time : 02/03/2022 07:14 UT
Root cause : Maintenance takes longer than expected.
Related maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c5v0ml8yn8bt

Mar 2, 07:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 02/03/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Interruption of the public network on rack G135A09
Root cause : Maintenance takes longer than expected.
Related maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c5v0ml8yn8bt
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working. There are still 2 servers unavailable at the moment.

entry.title: [LIM3][Network] - LIM0301A05A
entry.content:
Mar 1, 17:57 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/03/2022 14:19 UTC
End Time : 01/03/2022 17:35 UTC

Root cause :A network equipment was unreachable

Mar 1, 14:39 UTC

Root cause : A network equipment is unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working on the problem.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
